Bringing a new platform for listing and viewing safe and potential crypto projects.
APETODAY APP (DEMO)
ApeToday is an innovative new platform for listing and voting on crypto-assets, designed to increase adoption of cryptocurrencies and help find safe and potential projects.

ApeToday significantly helps investors discover new DeFi projects, follow trends and explore new crypto-assets with its innovative services such as KYC, Audits, AMAs and voting.

ApeToday's unique model and advanced capabilities will establish it as a leader in the field, helping investors explore new tokens and discover new and safe investment opportunities.

ApeToday provides cryptocurrency projects before CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko and major exchanges. Find the best cryptocurrency projects on our platform.

ApeToday will launch its own native token that will allow users to access exclusive information, services, and early access to new features.

5% TRANSACTION FEE ON BUYS AND SELLS

0 %

Meaning that we will always maintain a stable liquidity pool, giving you access to your funds at anytime – on demand.

VIEW WHITEPAPER

More Information on the APP Features and Functions coming soon...

APETODAY APP (DEMO)

DOWNLOAD & SETUP METAMASK OR TRUSTWALLET

Download MetaMask (a crypto wallet in the form of a browser extension) and TrustWallet (an app for your phone). After that you will have to add the Binance Smart Chain to your network-list.

BUY AND SEND BNB TO METAMASK

Buy BNB on an exchange (i.e. Binance, Kraken, Coinbase etc.). Transfer the tokens to your MetaMask wallet address. BEP-20 addresses start with a "0x".

HEAD ON TO PANCAKESWAP

Head on over to PancakeSwap and use the Contract Address to find the Token. Set the slippage tolerance to 15% (but could be higher depending on how much demand there is).

VIEW AND HODL

Swap BNB for the Token. Now you need to add it to your MetaMask or Trust Wallet to view your current holdings. Lastly, HODL!

BUY APETODAY
